name: Fat Basset
description:
This a game about lugging a cute fat basset hound around and trying clean up its poo. It's a comedic, silly and charming experience.  Anyone that owns a pet can relate. 

Controls:

  • arrow keys / wasd to move
  • mouse 1 to pick up objects
  • mouse 2 to throw objects

Assets:

  • art was made in mc paint 3D
  • music was made by me
  • Game code and design done by me
  • dog bark sfx made by Mixkit
